name: The Big Scrumpulon
description:
Approved by Roger Corman as CANON to The Wild Angels (X9XX).

Follow parole officer Cameron Ignatz Alyosha and Blue as they make their way to the New Hope Clinic for basic psychological examinations, and nothing more.

Will they survive their journey, or will the punkoid infested plains of South Dakota prove too inhospitable for even the sturdiest men?
